docs.title: 🧠 LLM Generative AI Course
docs.text: Welcome to the Generative AI course! This site provides access to notebooks, assignments, and learning resources for developers working with large language models.

docs.title: 📌 About the Instructor
docs.text:
Veerasak (Kris) Kritsanapraphan Senior Director, Platform Development Expert in AI, software architecture, and platform engineering. Kris has led initiatives across fintech, retail, and health sectors to integrate AI into real-world business operations.

📫 Connect on LinkedIn

This course is designed for developers ready to explore how LLMs can power the future of applications.

docs.title: 📅 Course Schedule
docs.text: Week Topic Notebook 1 Introduction to LLMs 01_inference_llama3.ipynb 2 Prompt Engineering EXERCISE_llm_prompting.ipynb 3 Fine-Tuning with LoRA 02_lora_finetuning.ipynb 4 Retrieval-Augmented Generation 03_rag_with_chromadb.ipynb 5 Final Project & Evaluation Student Custom Submission

docs.title: 📤 Final Project Submission
docs.text: Submit your final notebook or mini-app using one of the following methods:

docs.title: 1. GitHub Repo
docs.text:
• Fork this course repo
  • Create a folder under projects/<your-name>
  • Commit your notebook or app code
  • Submit pull request with title: Final Project - Your Name

docs.title: 2. Google Form Upload
docs.text:
• Open Submission Form
  • Upload your .ipynb or .zip

Deadline: Final Week, Friday 11:59 PM
